channel.title: gh on Tech
channel.description: Recent content in gh on Tech

item.title: Command-line tools of GitHub
item.description: Command-line tools of GitHub # gh command # Get token on GitHub # Access https://github.com/settings/tokens Click Generate new token > Generate new token (classic) Fill in some fields in a form (enter any name in Note) Click Generate new token Copy new token Install on macOS # % brew install gh Log in GitHub from the terminal on macOS # % gh auth login ? What account do you want to log into?
